content:
Dear colleagues, I post here a position for PhD studies at Public University of Navarra:

PhD position open for image processing in the context of neurosciences.

the position is EU-funded, and main conditions are as follows:

Deadline: November 30th

Location: Pamplona, Spain, with expected stages abroad.

Conditions: 3 years, circa. 25k€ plus expenses

you can contact for more details or find more information here: https://euraxess.ec.europa.eu/jobs/462130

Best regards,

Cédric Marco-Detchart
